name: Keshan
appearance: Rope-burned hands, reef scars on calves, hair salted into tight curls; wears a pilotâ€™s bone token carved with three safe cuts.
character: Protective of the Glassreef, sardonic humor at shorefolk, steady in fog.
skills: fog navigation by scent and sound
dreams: Raise a living bridge from the Reef-Mother in his lifetime
Train a new cohort that puts the reef first
secrets: Maps a narrow cut to the Veiled Current and sells it once a year to fund repairs for injured harvesters
Left a pilot to drown to save a spawning bed; the shells keen in his dreams
